name: Strâmb
description:
Strâmb means crooked in Romanian.

It's also puzzle platformer. This is our first itch.io project and our first experience developing a game, hope you enjoy!

Controls:

  • Movement: WASD
  • Restart: R
  • Pause: P
  • ???: Space

Developed with Unity 2020.3 between April 4th and May 1st of 2022 for the Newbies Game Jam (2022 - 1).
Sound Effects from the FREE Casual Game SFX Pack package. Fonts from the Statement - A casual font.
